title: Network-Based Online Collaborative Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Working professionals with time constraints but possessing digital device skills, aiming to enhance science subject expertise

learning_goals: Learners can build knowledge networks for scientific problem-solving using online collaboration tools.

Learners can evaluate three peer scientific argumentation posts in an asynchronous discussion forum using a rubric (clarity, logical coherence, sufficiency of evidence), and write a peer assessment report including at least two constructive feedbacks.
Learners can collaboratively create digital content explaining scientific concepts in LMS collaborative spaces (wikis, Google Docs, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
